channel.title: How do i make karils bow require Bolt racks?
channel.description: How do i make karils bow require bolt racks? Right now in my server it requires rune arrows!!! PLEASE HELP!!!!

item.title: How do i make karils bow require Bolt racks?
item.dc:creator: @silabgarza silabgarza
item.description:
@silabgarza wrote:

bubbsy looks like ur new to private servers…

look for ur checkarrow void and it may look like it will work 4 all arrows

however it just works for rune arrows…

switch it with this…

[code]public void CheckArrows()
{
for(int k = 880; k < 893; k++){

if(playerEquipment[playerArrows] == 892 || playerEquipment[playerArrows] == 884 || playerEquipment[playerArrows] == 882 || playerEquipment[playerArrows] == 886 || playerEquipment[playerArrows] == 888 || playerEquipment[playerArrows] == 890 || playerEquipment[playerArrows] == 892 || playerEquipment[playerArrows] == 4740 || playerEquipment[playerArrows] == 883 || playerEquipment[playerArrows] == 885 || playerEquipment[playerArrows] == 887 || playerEquipment[playerArrows] == 889 || playerEquipment[playerArrows] == 891 || playerEquipment[playerArrows] == 893){
HasArrows = true;
}
else if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 4214){
HasArrows = true;
}
else {
HasArrows = false;
}

}
}[/code]

that shuld work with almost every arrow…

only problem i have is that i cant make the arrows only b compatible with certain bows…

i think it has something 2 do iwth if (playerequipment[weapon] == BOW-ID && playerequipment[arrows] == ARROW-ID) {
return = true) else return = false

idk thats just my best guess lol

Read full topic
